pytket-pyzx
===========

| ```pytket`` <https://cqcl.github.io/pytket>`__ is a Python module for
  interfacing
| with CQC t\|ket>, a set of quantum programming tools.

| `PyZX <https://github.com/Quantomatic/pyzx>`__ is an open-source
  Python library for
| automated rewriting and optimisation of quantum circuits using the
| `ZX-calculus <http://zxcalculus.com/>`__.

| ``pytket_pyzx`` is an extension to ``pytket`` that allows conversion
  to and from
| PyZX representations.

Getting started
---------------

| ``pytket_pyzx`` is available for Python 3.6, 3.7 and 3.8, on Linux and
  MacOS. To
| install, run:

``pip install pytket_pyzx``
